segments.text: Room service.What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have just checked in this afternoon . I am wondering what shall I do if I want to have some clothes washed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a laundry form in your room ars well as a bag.Fill out the form and put them together with the laundry in the bag.The maid will come and pick it up .
segments.speaker: S1
